Aired 06/04/2025 Evansville Rotary Club Evansville Rotary Club **Regional Voices: Habitat for Humanity & Ivy Tech - Build Together, Learn Together** Season 2025 Episode 21 | 45m 46s Representatives from Ivy Tech and Habitat for Humanity talk about Build Together, Learn Together. Representatives from Ivy Tech and Habitat for Humanity talk about the housing problems in the community, the growing need for volunteers, and establishing a foundation to Build Together and Learn Together.
